extendedInfo.description: An UNIQUE game to let kids to coloring bunny pictures just like doodle on real paper! The user experience is TOTALLY different with most other coloring games on google paly store, which just let kids to tap picture to fill blocks with color.There's a happy rabbit family, daddy, mommy, little brother bobo, and little sister coco. They love each other so much, and enjoy their happy life in a beautiful small town.Enjoy the coloring with coco and bobo, share the colorful life with them.- 50 pictures of bunny family- four kinds brushes to coloring- easy color picker - pinch to zoom in/out to coloring on small block- movie mode to replay the coloring like a small film.- show or hide menu by tapping the right-bottom button- built-in gallery to store both coloring picture and coloring animation.âââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââ    Kids Coloring Book: 120 in 1       ââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââââWe have another collection having 120 pictures of various kinds, including girls, boys, cars, airplanes, flowers, animals, dinosaurs, and Christmas etc. Please search "Doodle Joy Studio" on Google Play to download "Kids Coloring Book: 120 in 1" for it.-------* All the rights of bunny pictures in this game belong to Doodle Joy Studio.

reviews.title: Great colouring. Needs work
reviews.comment: I don\'t know how you could bring the memory use down but you need to. Even so it already beats competing apps.
reviews.author: Tim Keegan

reviews.title: Coloring doodle bunny go
reviews.comment: Its fun and exciting
reviews.author: Eva Licup

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t  deserve a star because you know WTF!!!!! My sister almost wreck  my tablet good thing I stop her this game is a disaster and bad influence people trust me  and who\'s the crazy person who would give it a 5 star
reviews.author: Mikel Bernabe

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Whenever I try and open a colouring book, a message pops up saying I haven\'t got enough memory, even with this latest update! Uninstalling. It\'s a waste of memory, I don\'t know about being low on memory.
reviews.author: Skyler Willis

reviews.title: Not Worth Downloading!
reviews.comment: Application is not user friendly for young children. In less than 5 minutes, my 5 year old was frusterated and uninterested. Every time she touched the screen , it would zoom in and out, give a pop-up screen or bump us off the screen.
reviews.author: Erin Muransky

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: I installed this app on my HTC EVO 4G LTE yesterday for my 4 year old twin nieces to play with and we loved it. Now just installed on my new Nexus 7. We all love to color and this was pretty cute.
reviews.author: Arlene Luciano

reviews.title: Great game... except...
reviews.comment: I really do love this game! I use it and I am not even a kid :D But could you make a more detailed one, yunnow for older people, with an eyedropper, more brush settings, etc. I would be even cooler if you could upload your own pics and use the app to colour them in.
reviews.author: Essie Adelanwa

reviews.title: Bunny go colouring book
reviews.comment: The app keep\'s crashing
reviews.author: John Critchlow

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: I am 10 and i love this game!
reviews.author: Anna Scott

reviews.title: What memory
reviews.comment: It\'s great the 3% of the time when it works.  The other 97% of the time it tells me having 1gig of the nearly 2gig of memory free its not enough.  How it\'s 1 gig free not enough on my gs3... unless this is yet another one of the many gs3\'s problems.
reviews.author: Josh Nelson

reviews.title: Ok but one thing is not kid appropriate.
reviews.comment: The app seems to work ok, but unfortunately I did not notice until after I loaded it that the father bunny is smoking a pipe in several pictures.   That is not something I would want to be encouraging a child to do so why have this in a children\'s coloring game?  I give it 2 stars unless the developer removes the smoking, then it would get 4.  Will uninstall because of this.  I have since found a better app,  Coloring pages color and draw by PINADDON.  That is the best coloring app.
reviews.author: Suzanne P

reviews.title: Can\'t open
reviews.comment: Wudnt give it a star at all but it wudnt let me comment til I did....would not open at all! Uninstall
reviews.author: Susie Smith

reviews.title: After you get the hang of it
reviews.comment: Cute. Not for under 5 yrs old
reviews.author: Sandy Wowk Condrey

reviews.title: Colouring bunney
reviews.comment: This is excellent it is good for all ages
reviews.author: Naomi Watson

reviews.comment: Love the doddles,but you can\'t color in some stuff though that\'s my only problem it gets frustrating ,but other wise it\'s a great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Come on! How can you not love it! it is the best app in the universe!
reviews.author: Frances O\'Connor

reviews.title: zoom. not again...
reviews.comment: Too easy to go into zoom mode. Interrupts the enjoyment.
reviews.author: Gediminas Girg\305\276dys

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Good game for the kids
reviews.author: Tom Francis

reviews.title: Annoying error
reviews.comment: Keep getting a storage space error. Pretty annoying..
reviews.author: Kerstein Ward

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I was actually looking for a coloring app for my 2 year old, and although this is a bit too detailed for him I got it for me! I love how it\'s like your actually coloring, not just filling in spaces.and the multiple shades is awesome.
reviews.author: Monica Warner
